title: surface-cut-resample
description:
Resample a cut surface.

Resamples a surface file, given two spherical surfaces that are in register.  Barycentric resampling is used, because it is usually better for resampling surfaces, and because it is needed to figure out the new topology anyway.

current_sphere.title: current_sphere
current_sphere.description: a sphere surface with the mesh that the input surface is currently on

new_sphere.title: new_sphere
new_sphere.description: a sphere surface that is in register with <current-sphere> and has the desired output mesh
